Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Authorizes a deduction of a marketing allowance for certain gaming facilities
Summary: Authorizes a deduction of a marketing allowance equal to an amount up to eight percent of gross gaming revenue from slot machines for gaming facilities in region two.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing a deduction of a marketing allowance for certain gaming facilities
